desc: BackShield™ is an innovative & ergonomically-designed back support product to relieve your back back pain. Perfect for cars, trucks, & home office chairs.

layout.text:
Love your back,
love your life!

Improving posture relieves back pain allowing you to live a life of comfort and enjoyment. We at Backshield are committed in bringing you a solution for good posture and back pain relief so you can enjoy life to the fullest.
